analyzed: mahā ugra tārā stutiḥ
om namaḥ śrī ugratārāyai
prakaṭa vikaṭa daṃṣṭrā ghora rudra aṭṭahāsā
nara śira kṛta mālā megha gambhīra rāvā
tribhuvana jana dhātrī khaḍga vinyasta hastā
karakarati kapālā pātu vaḥ ugra tārā
ghora rūpe mahā rāve sarva śatru kṣayaṅkari

original: bhaktebhyo varade devi trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 1 ||
analyzed: bhaktebhyaḥ vara de devi trāhi mām śaraṇa āgatam
sura asura arcite devi siddha gandharva sevite
jāḍya pāpa hare devi trāhi mām śaraṇa āgatam
sarva maṇḍala madhya sthe
sarva sattva hitenaghe

original: siddhānāṃ pūjite devi trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 3 ||
analyzed: siddhānām pūjite devi trāhi mām śaraṇa āgatam
ghora rūpa sthite devi sarva prāṇa hare stute

original: ugratāre namo nityaṃ trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 4 ||
analyzed: ugra tāre namaḥ nityam trāhi mām śaraṇa āgatam
jaṭā jūṭa samāyukte lalat jihvā ūrdhva kāriṇi
druta buddhi prade devi trāhi mām śaraṇa āgatam
soma rūpe koṭṭa rūpe candra rūpe namaḥ astu te
śakti rūpe namaḥ tubhyam trāhi mām śaraṇa āgatam
jaḍā ūham śakti hīnā ūham na tava adhigame kṣamaḥ
mandaḥ manda matiḥ ca aham trāhi mām śaraṇa āgatam

original: snāne dāne tathā jāpye balidāne tathā kratau |
analyzed: snāne dāne tathā jāpye bali dāne tathā kratau

original: prasthāne ca na śakto'haṃ trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 8 ||
analyzed: prasthāne ca na śaktā uham trāhi mām śaraṇa āgatam
śakti hīnam anātham ca sarva pāpa samanvitam

original: tvāṃ vinā na gatiryasya trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 9 ||
analyzed: tvām vinā na gatiḥ yasya trāhi mām śaraṇa āgatam
gaurī lakṣmīḥ mahāmāyā umā devī sarasvatī
sarvāḥ tvam eva he mātar trāhi mām śaraṇa āgatam
gandha puṣpa ādi dravyaiḥ ca vandhana ādibhiḥ eva ca

original: devīṃ sampūjya yatnena labhate vāñchitaṃ phalam || 11 ||
analyzed: devīm sampūjya yatnena labhate vāñchitam phalam

original: aṣṭamyāṃ ca caturdaśyāṃ navamyāṃ yaḥ paṭhennaraḥ |
analyzed: aṣṭamyām ca caturdaśyām navamyām yaḥ paṭhet naraḥ
paramām siddhim āpnoti na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: mokṣārthī labhate mokṣaṃ dhanārthī labhate dhanam |
analyzed: mokṣa arthī labhate mokṣam dhana arthī labhate dhanam
vidyā arthī labhate vidyām tarka vyākaraṇa ādikām

original: idaṃ stotraṃ paṭhitvā tu saṃgrāme praviśennaraḥ |
analyzed: idam stotram paṭhitvā tu saṃgrāme praviśet naraḥ

original: tasya śatruḥ kṣayaṃ yāti sadā prajñā prajāyate || 14 ||
analyzed: tasya śatruḥ kṣayam yāti sadā prajñā prajāyate  /
pīḍāyām atha saṃdhāne vipadāyām tathā bhaye

original: ya idaṃ paṭhate stotraṃ śubhaṃ tasya na saṃśayaḥ || 15 ||
analyzed: yaḥ idam paṭhate stotram śubham tasya na saṃśayaḥ
śrī mahā ugratārā stutiḥ samāptā
